notes.text: Mikhail Mendelev (Ames Laboratory) noted that the potential is designed to simulate liquid/glass properties and solidification in the NiZr2 alloy. The potential utilizes the following interactions from other potentials: Ni = 2012--Mendelev-M-I-Kramer-M-J-Hao-S-G-et-al--Ni and Zr = 2007--Mendelev-M-I-Ackland-G-J--Zr-2. 31 May 2013: The reference was updated to reflect the publication status.
